PC Number Date Chapter Bill Dept
 1993-14871993-06-250,  ,  PMO,  , 
PrecisTransfer to the Department of INDUSTRY, SCIENCE AND TECHNOLOGY the control and supervision of the INVESTMENT REVIEW DIVISION, the INVESTMENT RESEARCH AND POLICY DIVISION, Automated Applications, Telematics and New Media, Spectrum Management Operations, Certification and Engineering Bureau, Communications Research Centre, the Office of the Assistant Deputy Minister (Quebec), Regional Spectrum Services Centre and Canadian Workplace Automation Research Centre and to the MINISTER, all the powers, duties and functions of the Minister of CONSUMER AND CORPORATE AFFAIRS and to AMALGAMATE AND COMBINE the Department of Industry, Science and Technology and the Department of Consumer and Corporate Affairs under the Minister and Deputy Minister of Industry, Science and Technology.
RegistrationRegistration: SI / 1993-0141 Publication Date: 1993-07-14
